channel.title: Posts on QSCI 381 Labs
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on QSCI 381 Labs

item.title: Lab 01
item.description: Skills In this lab, we will practice computing descriptive statistics and making plots in R for a dataset about animal sleep habits. First, download the template R Markdown file for Lab 01 here . Open this template in RStudio. In R Markdown files, you can switch between text and code. This line is text, but below is a code chunk. In your template file, the first code chunk has the name load_data and the options warning = F, message = F.

item.title: Lab 00
item.description: Before your first lab section, you should work through the slides below to install R and check that all the software works on your computer. Slides Lab Report Template
